title: SWE - Cellular Verification Engineer (Pre-Silicon), WTE
summary: Join the Wireless Technologies and Ecosystems (WTE) organization and be part of an outstanding team of engineers, working with multi-functional teams to drive innovation and develop products used by millions worldwide. In this role we're looking for a talented engineer with programming and test knowledge in C/C++ with a good understanding of LTE or 5G. You'll work across the protocol layers on groundbreaking technologies in a pre-silicon environment.
description: This role involves designing verification strategies, develop test suites and maintaining regression test systems to ensure Apple wireless products conform to 3GPP protocols and offer a best-in-class user experience. If you're passionate about cellular technologies and have the dream to work on groundbreaking cellular technologies this is a wonderful opportunity. As part of this team, you will play a crucial role in delivering the next-generation iPhone user experience worldwide.
key_qualifications: Good understanding of LTE or NR and related 3GPP/ETSI standards. Knowledge in cellular protocols (e.g. PHY, MAC, RLC, RRC, NAS, etc.) in LTE/NR domain. Software development and debugging skills including design & programming (C/C++). Experience in test case scripting, and conforming to relevant ETSI/3GPP protocol technical specifications is important. Proficient with test automation and scripting (e.g. Python). Comprehensive log analysis, fixing, analytical and problem-solving skills. Highly motivated and proactive, fast learner, a good great teammate
education_experience: Bachelors or Masters in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science or equivalent with significant industry experience working in Cellular Protocol S/W development or Test.
